start.text: I'll take up command. Any objections?
I'll show you all how it's done.
The one with the highest score wins.
These guys won't know what hit 'em.

start_boss.text: Only the strong survive out here.
Let's settle who's best once and for all.
Now I finally get my chance to show off.

retreat.text: As we say in my house, there's a thin line between bravery and stupidity.
Man, I need missions that can help me improve my score, not this crap.
That's what you get for half-assing it.

need_help.text: We just run if they shoot us, right?

pursuing.text: No way anyone's gonna take the top score from me.

running.text: Sorry, but I'm out of here.
You guys do whatever you want. I'm going off by myself.
All right, I'll leave you to your fun.

hull_90.text: Don't get excited. It's beginner's luck.
You want a gold-plated toilet, too?

hull_50.text: Come on baby, stay with me just a bit more.

hull_30.text: Come on, that's enough, right? Let's get out of here!

overload.text: I can't focus on attacking like this!
Honestly, this pisses me off more than it scares me.
Hey, knock that off, would you?
What a pain in the ass.

victory.text: That looks like the last of them.
It's like watching a fireworks display.

victory_boss.text: Be sure to include in the report how much ass I kicked.
